import React from 'react' import person2 from "../../assets/person2.jpg"; export default function PravinHungund() { return ( <>

Mr. Pravin Hungund

Chief Technology Officer

Metaz Digital

Metaz Digital

Pravin Hungund CTO, Metaz Digital Chapter President, Bangalore VRARA Grand Jury, CII Industrial Innovation Awards 2022 CXO Thought leader with a full spectrum of experience cutting across Emerging Technology R&D, Solution development, Innovation, Consulting, Business P&L management. He has influenced several multi-million deals over the years through 3000+ CXO workshops and is a trusted advisor for CXOâ€™s. He has developed 100+ fully immersive solutions having developed an in-depth experience in innovating, conceptualizing, productizing solutions and executing Go-To-Market strategies for fortune 500/1000 companies. He is widely experienced in leading H2, H3 strategic development programs across Cloud, AI, Metaverse -AR/VR/MR, IOT, Robotics & Drones, 5G, Blockchain. He has delivered keynote sessions in several global conferences and published Thought leaderships articles & Podcasts, He is on advisory board of Industry Bodies as Chapter President for VRARA Bangalore & Co Leader for Fusion of Emerging Tech- India chapter, Grand Jury for CII Industrial Innovation Awards 2022, Chairman for CII TNDPC Industry Conferences, Member of National Advisory Board of Journal of Health Policy Research, Chairman for Environment for Rotary Bengaluru Harmony, Co-Chair for District Agri committee for District 3190. As CTO, MetaZ Digital, Pravin is responsible to create a technology strategy and road map to help Customers adopt technology to drive business growth. He is passionate about Innovating with Metaverse and has been conceptualizing and designing solutions for Customer globally.

) }
